articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squads of KPA Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squads of KPA Units
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched the performance given by the art squads of KPA Units 567, 324 and 233 that proved successful at the 1st contest among art squads of the KPA.
					 Put on the stage were numbers of diverse genres like chorus "Might of Korea", poem recital "Tell, O Mt. Taedok, famous mountain for Songun", female quartet "Our dear supreme commander", real story-telling "Great comrade-in-arms" and so on.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and the unshakable faith and will of all service personnel to protect Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un at the cost of their lives and unfailingly accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly praised the art performance as a presentation fully representing the party policies and permeated with its idea, the one with perfect ensemble and the dynamic one featured with the characteristics and appearances of the units.
					
					 The creators and artistes of the art squads went deep among service personnel as intended by the party and created art pieces reflecting their ardent patriotism and desire to perform feats, he noted, repeatedly appreciating the revolutionary creative spirit of the art squads which create new culture in the era of Songun. 
					
					 He personally suggested special places for the art squads of KPA units 567, 324 and 233 and extended the particular thanks of the Supreme Commander of the KPA to their creators and players. Then he had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Noting that art squad activities are very important for the education of service personnel as they have great influence, strong appeal and mobility, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Jo Kyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: DPRK Clarifies Principled Stand
articles.content:
DPRK Clarifies Principled Stand 
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the north side delegation for north-south high-level contact Tuesday made public a statement clarifying the DPRK's principled stand concerning the grave hurdle lying in the way of implementing the hard-won agreement made at the north-south high-level contact.
					 It said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have talked a lot about improving the north-south relations and laying a foundation for national reunification through "confidence-building" whenever an opportunity presented itself.
					
					 However, they have gone the lengths of daring slander even the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					1. The south Korean authorities should not deliberately wag their tongues.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean authorities that take the lead in mud-slinging at the DPRK in gross violation of the agreement made at the north-south high-level contact.
					
					 The minister of Foreign Affairs is persistently letting loose such very provocative and reckless remarks as the north is conducting a dialogue offensive "but, in actuality, it is busy with such provocations" as demanding a halt to the joint military exercises "while showing no sign of change."
					
					 The minister of Unification is obsessed with such accusations against compatriots that he is letting loose base and disgusting outbursts that "even soup would not be offered" to the north in case it fails to keep a promise. What he uttered is lashing the service personnel and people in the north into fury.
					
					  It is no exaggeration to say that it is none other than the bosses of ministries and agencies in charge of the north affairs of south Korea who recklessly wag their tongues to turn its whole into a theatre of anti-DPRK smear campaign. 
					
					 If they are truly concerned for the improved north-south relations, the authorities should stop their reckless mud-slinging, though belatedly, as it is the root cause of all disasters.
					
					2. The south Korean conservative media had better behave themselves.
					
					 When Choson Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative newspapers release misinformation on the basis of sheer lies, KBS, MBC, SBS and other broadcasting services kick up a smear campaign by adding silly stories to it.
					
					 Mass media in south Korea should not act as organizations of hack writers inciting distrust and enmity and fostering division after being reduced to waiting maids serving the wrong regime but act as a patriotic guide contributing to national reconciliation and peaceful reunification. 
					
					3. The south Korean authorities should stop resorting to such foolish acts as protecting despicable human scum by force of arms and hurling them into scattering anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 As far as human scum called "defectors form the north" are concerned, they are good-for-nothings worse than dogs as they took to flight, forsaken even by their kith and kin for perpetrating all kinds of evils such as murder, robbery, a dissipated and corrupt life and scandals. 
					
					 How poor and mean the south Korean authorities' attitude is as they use such disgusting dregs of the times for their smear campaign and confrontation with the north.
					
					 The DPRK sent meaningful warning notices to Chongwadae twice that south Korea would get nothing in future if it doesn't stop such mud-slinging as scattering leaflets against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear deep in mind that the more persistently they insist that "they cannot restrict the mud-slinging at the north as long as there is no clear reason", making absurd excuses such as "freedom of expression, rally and association," the more clearly they will reveal their incompetence, much less shirking their responsibility for bedeviling the north-south relations. 
					
					 Although the north-south high-level contact was held and a precious national agreement was reached amid the great expectation and concern of all Koreans, the situation prevailing at present less than a month since then is so beyond imagination. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear deep in mind that there can be confidence-building touted by them and a bright prospect for improving the inter-Korean relations when they respect the other party and honestly implement the agreement.
					
					 The present time does not allow fooling the nation with an empty talk.
					
					 The DPRK will closely watch the attitude and moves of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Report of Central Election Committee on Results on Election of Deputies to 13th SPA
articles.content:
Report of Central Election Committee on Results on Election of Deputies to 13th SPA
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The election of the deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly took place successfully in the DPRK
					 The Central Election Committee Tuesday reported the results on the election held on Sunday.
					
					 According to the report, the election was held according to the Rules on the Elections of Deputies to the People's Assemblies at All Levels.
					
					 According to the election returns available, 99.97 percent of all the voters registered on the lists of voters across the country took part in the election and 100 percent of them voted for the candidates for deputies to the SPA registered in the relevant constituencies. 
					
					 This is an expression of the absolute support and trust of all voters in the DPRK government, the genuine people's power which serves the people and relies on them, and a manifestation of the steadfast will of the service personnel and people to consolidate the people's power as firm as a rock and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Electors on foreign tours or working in oceans could not take part in the election. 
					
					 The Central Election Committee deliberated the reports on the election returns submitted by constituency election committees across the country and reported the names of 686 elected deputies to the SPA.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday.
					 The message said his election as deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK signified a great national jubilee which witnessed the realization of the noble intention of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and an stirring event in which the ardent desire of not only the people in the homeland but all the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan was realized.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon extends the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, reflecting the boundless loyalty and reverence of all Koreans in Japan for him, it noted.
					
					 It is none other than Kim Jong Un who became the strong pillar of faith and encouraged all the people in the homeland, Chongryon officials and other compatriots in Japan during the days when they bitterly grieved over the unexpected demise of Kim Jong Il, and successfully led the state-building cause pioneered by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu even in the acute all-out confrontation with the U.S., thus turning the motherland into a paradise of happiness where the people live in luxury and comfort under socialism, it said.
					
					 The message expressed the will of all the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan to glorify the undying feats of the great Generalissimos under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, regard it as their greatest honor to devote themselves to the struggle to implement the important behests of Kim Jong Il, more thoroughly establish the monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un in the Chongryon organizations and live and struggle as his eternal overseas comrades-in-arms and comrades loving the country and the nation, faithfully holding him only in high esteem under any situation.

articles.title: Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Cambodian, Syrian Diplomats
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Cambodian, Syrian Diplomats
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, separately had conversations with new Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Op Sisawada and Syrian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim here Tammam Sulaiman who paid courtesy calls on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Arch Criminal Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- It is none other than the United States that has constantly escalated military tensions and increased the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK and the north-targeted joint military drills with south Korea are the cause of escalating the tensions and wrecking peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. stages large-scale joint military drills every year together with south Korea in a bid to threaten the DPRK by force of arms and ignite a new war on the peninsula.
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills started by the U.S. in south Korea from Feb. 24 are bringing into bolder relief their provocative and aggressive nature.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday why warships equipped with cruise missiles and other attack means, huge forces and information and operation commanding functions were deployed in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is introducing into other countries latest war hardware capable of striking any place on earth as it pleases, keen on the moves to unleash a war. But it is making far-fetched assertion that other countries cannot develop their self-defensive military capabilities on their territories. This brigandish logic cannot work on anyone.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove who poses a threat to peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the region and commits military provocation against others.
					
					 It is impossible to mend the inter-Korean relations falling into deep distrust and antagonism amid the military threat to the other side and the increasing danger of a war.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals in Asian Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Bags Three Gold Medals in Asian Championship
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Rim Un Sim bagged three gold medals in the 2014 Asian junior and juvenile weightlifting championship in Thailand.
					 On Mar. 10 she snatched 93 kg and jerked 113 kg, placing first in both events and total points at the junior 58 kg category.
					
					 Kim Hyo Sim placed second both in jerk and snatch, coming second in total points in the junior women's 63 kg category to bag three silver medals.

articles.title: Compost Fully Applied to Fields in DPRK
articles.content:
Compost Fully Applied to Fields in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Farms in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea concentrate their efforts on carrying compost to fields.
					 According to data available, tens of millions of tons of manure were applied to farm fields throughout the country in the first two months, carrying out the set plan at 90 percent.
					
					 South Hwanghae Province has overfulfilled its monthly plans for the production and carriage of compost through intensive mobilization of manpower and delivery means. More than 4 millions of tons of manure have been carried to the farm fields in the province.
					
					 North Hwanghae Province had large quantities of quality compost transported to fields, carrying out its highly-set daily plan.
					
					 North Phyongan Province, too, is hastening its plan for compost carriage at the final stage.
					
					 The production and carriage of manure have been already finished on the farms in Pyongyang and Nampho cities and North Hamgyong and Jagang provinces.
					
					 Meanwhile, farm villages across the country are striving to tap the sources of organic fertilizers and apply them to fields to suit their soil characteristics.
					
					 Jungsan County in South Phyongan Province transported to farm fields more than 40 000 tons of humus soil collected from waterways and riverbeds.

articles.title: DPRK Women Prove Successful at Int'l Freestyle Wrestling Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Women Prove Successful at Int'l Freestyle Wrestling Tournament
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK women proved successful at the 2014 International Open Freestyle Wrestling Tournament of Mongolia held in Ulan Bator.
					 Jon Hyang Nam came first in the 48kg category by fully displaying her special techniques.
					
					 Han Kum Ok also emerged a winner at the 55kg category through an effective application of diverse techniques and rich experience. 
					
					 Ri Yong Mi finished the second in the 69kg category.
					
					 The tournament brought together at least 160 men and women players of  ten countries. 
					
					 The DPRK players returned home on Tuesday.

articles.title: Tablet Computer Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Tablet Computer Popular in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Ryonghung-trademarked tablet computer, produced by the Ryongaksan IT Exchange Company of the DPRK, is enjoying popularity among people, agricultural officials and workers in particular.
					 This computer has software needed for access to information on scientific farming as well as agricultural sci-tech data.
					
					 Han Yong Suk, manager of the company, told KCNA:
					
					 The tablet computer helps get scientific and technological information on agricultural production, stockbreeding, pomiculture, sericulture, etc. It gives ample knowledge for scientific farming such as weather data related to different parts of the country and necessary measures.
					
					 It contains literary books, cookery and other common knowledge.
					
					 This portable computer, easy to handle, also contains diverse multimedia and games.

articles.title: U.S. Sends Flotilla of Warships to Three Ports of South Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Sends Flotilla of Warships to Three Ports of South Korea
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists introduced warships of the U.S. Navy into the Foal Eagle joint military drills targeting the DPRK, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 They simultaneously entered into the three ports of the East, West and South Seas of Korea on March 8.
					
					 Aegis guided missile destroyer Curtis Wilbur and an Aegis destroyer entered into Phyongtheak Port of Kyonggi Province.
					
					 Meanwhile, missile cruiser Lake Erie anchored in Mokpho Port of South Jolla Province and an Aegis destroyer in Thonghae Port of south Korean Kangwon Province.
					
					 The warships are loaded with striking means such as Tomahawk missiles, SM-3, SM-2 surface-to-air missiles and antisubmarine rockets.
					
					 The flotilla of warships is going to take part in the Foal Eagle joint military drills, large-scale field maneuvers aimed to invade the DPRK, and stage naval combined drills like as anti-submarine drill and naval drill.
					
					 It is the first time that the striking flotilla of the U.S. Navy simultaneously entered into various ports.
					
					 These huge naval striking forces' entry into ports of south Korea in the wake of the portcall of a nuclear submarine into Pusan Port on March 3 fully reveals the aggressive nature of the joint military drills.

articles.title: Japan Condemned by International Community
articles.content:
Japan Condemned by International Community 
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean MBC on March 7 reported that Japan became the target of criticism in the international arena for denying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 It said that the issue of sexual slavery enforced by Japan was the topic of argument at the meeting of the UN Human Rights Council held in Geneva.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 When Japan, refusing to admit the crime, insisted that the issue of reparation for it had already been settled under the "agreement" concluded between south Korea and Japan in 1965, representatives from different countries strongly protested against it and urged Japan to admit its responsibility for its crimes and sincerely opt for settling the issue.
					
					 Its recent meeting became a gathering for denouncing Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Doctors Protest against Authorities' Healthcare Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Doctors Protest against Authorities' Healthcare Policy 
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Doctors under the Doctors Association of south Korea Monday launched a collective campaign to boycott medical treatment in protest against the south Korean authorities' healthcare policy, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 The association said that many doctors affiliated to it including doctors of 50 to 60 hospitals would take part in the protest.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are threatening to brand their collective action as illegal and take such measures as suspension of their businesses and indictment against them.

articles.title: Suicide Increases in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suicide Increases in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Suicide has drastically increased in south Korea, according to south Korean CBS on March 6.
					 The Statistic Agency of south Korea said that the number of the suicide in 2012 is more than three times as compared with 1992.
					
					 It was reported that the number of people who choose death, pessimistic about hard living, is on the daily increase.

articles.title: Disbandment of IS Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disbandment of IS Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Voice of People editorially urged the regime to disband the Intelligence Service (IS) of south Korea on Mar. 10.
					 The editorial rapped the IS for trying to deceive the people again despite the fact that it can no longer conceal the truth about its fabricated spy case.
					
					 The regime will resort to such acts as patronizing the IS, disturbing the investigation, concealing truth and misleading public opinion through media this time, too, as it did in the past, it said.
					
					 It branded the IS as a group of criminals as it cooked up the spy case by falsifying truth without hesitation.
					
					 No wonder, even some staffers of the IS are calling for its reform, the editorial noted, adding the IS should no longer be allowed to abuse power.
					
					 It is crystal clear that the forthcoming local elections will prove to be fraudulent unless the IS is disbanded, it stressed.

articles.title: Chinese Paper on Agrarian Reform Law in DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Paper on Agrarian Reform Law in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Liaoning Joson Munbo carried an article titled "Agrarian Reform Law which realized long-cherished desire of peasants" on March 5.
					 March 5, 1946 was a historic day when the cherished desire of Korean peasants, who had wished to do farming on their own land to their heart's content, was realized, the article said, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who paid deep attention to settling the land problem before anything else in the efforts to build a new country after the liberation, worked his heart and soul to realize the centuries-old desire of peasants for the land.
					
					 He visited various places to acquaint himself with the conditions and peasants' demand in rural areas. He also indicated the orientation and ways to successfully carry out the agrarian reform.
					
					 Then, he promulgated the Agrarian Reform Law.
					
					 The agrarian reform was successfully carried out under his wise leadership, making a new history in which peasants became genuine masters of the land and the country, free from all sorts of exploitation.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book, Fine Art Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book, Fine Art Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- There took place a Korean photo, book and fine art exhibition in Beijing from March 6 to 9.
					 Displayed on the front wall of the exhibition hall were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. Also hung there were flags of the DPRK and China.
					
					 On display were photos documenting exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with distinguished talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were Chinese personages, a delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 At the ceremony speakers noted that the exhibits vividly showed the wisdom, talents and happy life of the Korean people and the time-honored history and fine culture of Korea.
					
					 Saying that the exhibition will offer Chinese people an opportunity to know better about Korea, they hoped that such cultural exchanges would take place more often to greatly contribute to boosting the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out at a chicken farm in Iljuk-myon, Ansong City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, according to the south Korean CBS on March 7.
					 It was reportedly the 6th time that birth flu broke out in the province.
					
					 Hundreds of culled chicken were confirmed to be infected with bird flu virus on March 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Feb. 28.
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of sophistry let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism slandering socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and commanding".
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it such as the issues of regarding socialism as faith, putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica de unidades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de grupos de propaganda artistica de unidades de EPC
 Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea presencio la funcion de los grupos de propaganda artistica de las unidades 567, 324 y 233 del EPC seleccionados en el primer concurso de los grupos de propaganda artistica del EPC.
					 En la escena se pusieron el coro "La fuerza de Corea", la recitacion de poesia "!Cuenta, el famoso monte Taedok del Songun!", el cuarteto femenino "Nuestro querido Comandante Supremo", la narracion de historia verdadera "Gran companero de armas", el drama poetico de agitacion "!Continuemos firmemente la tradicion del monte Paektu!", la pieza corta "Dos jefes de escuadra en el lugar de entrenamiento" y otras piezas de diversas formas.
					
					 A traves de la funcion los ejecutantes demostraron bien el invencible poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y la firme conviccion y voluntad de todos los oficiales y soldados de defender a ultranza al Comandante Supremo y llevar a feliz termino con fusiles la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo evaluo altamente que la funcion esta bien penetrada por la politica y la idea del partido y refleja bien la caracteristica y el aspecto de sus respectivas unidades.
					
					 Diciendo que los creadores y los artistas de los grupos de propaganda artistica han creado las obras con el amor a la patria y la aspiracion a las proezas de los militares encontrandose entre ellos conforme al intento del partido, volvio a evaluar el espiritu revolucionario de creacion de creadores de nueva cultura de la epoca del Songun.
					
					 Propuso condecorar con el grado especial a la funcion de los grupos de propagada artistica de dichas unidades del EPC, dio agradecimiento especial del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los creadores y artisticos y se fotografio junto con  ellos.
					
					 Son muy importantes las actividades de los grupos de propaganda artistica que revisten gran influencia, el caracter exhortativo y la movilidad en la educacion ideologica a los militares, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en las actividades de la funcion.
					
					 Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Jo Kyong Chol, Hwang Pyong So y los oficiales y soldados del EPC.

articles.title: Comite Electoral Central informa resultado de elecciones de diputados a APS
articles.content:
Comite Electoral Central informa resultado de elecciones de diputados a APS
 Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tuvieron lugar con exito el dia 9 las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema. 
					 El Comite Electoral Central informo este martes el resultado electoral. 
					
					 Segun la informacion, las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la APS se realizaron en virtud de la ley electoral de diputados a las asambleas populares de todos los niveles. 
					
					 De acuerdo con las estadisticas recogidas, el 99.97 por ciento del electorado acudieron a las urnas y votaron en 100 por ciento a favor de los candidatos al diputado registrados en las respectivas circunscripciones. 
					
					 Esto es una expresion de apoyo absoluto y confianza de todos los electores en el poder de la RPDC, autentico poder del pueblo que sirve para este y se apoya en las masas populares.
					
					 Igualmente, constituye una manifestacion de la firme conviccion y voluntad de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de consolidar el poder popular y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					 Los electores que trabajan en el extranjero o en alta mar no pudieron participar en esos comicios.
					
					 El Comite Electoral Central examino el informe sobre los resultados electorales presentado por los comites distritales de todo el pais para las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC y anuncio los nombres de 686 diputados electos.

articles.title: Imperialismo yanqui moviliza colectivos de buque de guerra en Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Imperialismo yanqui moviliza colectivos de buque de guerra en Foal Eagle
 Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun Yonhap News del Sur de Corea, el imperialismo norteamericano movilizo los buques de guerra de las fuerzas navales en los ejercicios militares conjuntos Foal Eagle contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Los colectivos de buques de guerra de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas entraron el dia 8 al mismo tiempo en los 3 puertos del Mar Este, Oeste y Sur de Corea.
					
					 Los destructores inclusive Curtis Wilbur entraron en el Puerto de Phyongthaek de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					
					 En tanto, el crucero Lake Erie anclo en el Puerto de Mokpho y un destructor, en el de Tonghae de la provincia de Kwangwon del Sur de Corea.
					
					 Los buques de guerra estan cargados de los medios de ataque, entre otros misiles Tomahawk, los misiles antiaereos SM-3, SM-2 y el cohete antisubmarino.
					
					 Estos colectivos de buques de guerra planean desarrollar los ejercicios combinados maritimos, entre otros, el entrenamiento antisubmarino, la batalla ofensiva y defensiva maritima en el marco de los ejercicios moviles al aire libre de gran envergadura contra la RPDC.
					
					 Es primera vez que los colectivos de ataque de las fuerzas navales de las tropas yanqui entraron simultaneamente en varios puertos.
					
					 La entrada de las fuerzas maritimas de ataque seguido al submarino nuclear  que anclo el pasado dia 3  en el puerto de Pusan, demuestra claramente el caracter agresivo de presentes ejercicios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz de Peninsula Coreana
 Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos es el responsable que acarrea el nubarron de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana agravando constantemente la tension militar.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					 La brutal politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio y su maniobra militar conjunta con el Sur de Corea para la agresion al Norte de Corea son el factor que agrava la tension y perturba la paz en dicha peninsula.
					
					 Junto con las autoridades surcoreanas, EE.UU. viene librando anualmente los entrenamientos militares conjuntos de diferentes tipos contra la RPDC para amenazarla con la fuerza y desencadenar la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Los ejercicios Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, iniciados el 24 del mes pasado en el suelo surcoreano, pusieron al desnudo su caracter provocativo y agresivo.
					
					 Todo el mundo conoce bien por que entraron en el territorio surcoreano los buques agresores equipados con misiles cruceros y otros medios de ataque y cargados de muchos efectivos y personal de inteligencia y mando de operaciones.
					
					 Nunca saldra con la suya la teoria bandidesca de EE.UU., segun la cual este puede realizar los ejercicios de guerra despachando a su antojo al territorio ajeno los pertrechos militares sofisticados capaces de atacar cualesquier blancos del mundo, pero otros paises no tienen derecho a desarrollar su poderio militar autodefensivo ni en las tierras propias.
					
					 La realidad demuestra quien es el criminal que amenaza la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y comete los actos provocativos militares contra la contraparte.
					
					 Bajo tal situacion, no se mejoraran jamas las relaciones intercoreanas que se hallan en la desconfianza y el antagonismo.
